scripts.postdeploy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const contracts = ['DAO', 'Proposal']; contracts.forEach(c => { const src = path.join(__dirname, 'artifacts/contracts', c + '.sol', c + '.json'); const dest = path.join(__dirname, 'frontend/src/contracts', c + '.json'); if (fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Copied ' + c + '.json to frontend/src/contracts'); } });"
